recipes.name: Tuna Salad
recipes.description: A quick and easy tuna salad recipe that is perfect for a healthy lunch or snack.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: Drain the canned tuna and place it in a mixing bowl.
Chop the celery and red onion into small pieces and add them to the bowl with the tuna.
Add the mayonnaise, dijon mustard, lemon juice, salt, and pepper to the bowl and mix well.
Serve the tuna salad on a bed of lettuce or in a sandwich.

recipes.name: Mug Omelette
recipes.description: In a hurry? Try a microwave omelette! It's amazingly light and fluffy. You'll have an easy meal in a few minutes.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: Lightly coat the inside of a large mug with the olive oil.
Finely chop the green onions.
Crack the eggs into the mug, add milk, and beat with a fork.
Add the rest of the ingredients. Stir well with a fork until mixed.
Microwave for 30 seconds on high. Remove from microwave and stir with a fork.
Return to the microwave and cook for another 20 to 30 seconds.
Repeat this until the egg has set to your preference.

recipes.name: Microwave Sweet Potato
recipes.description: Satisfying snack that can be made in a microwave.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: Wash the sweet potato.
Prick the sweet potato with a fork and wrap it with a wet paper towel.
Microwave on High power making sure to flip and continue cooking on the second side: 2 to 3 minutes per side.
Prick both sides to assess doneness, taking care because it is hot. If the fork goes in all the way with no give, it is done. Otherwise, continue cooking at 1 minute intervals until tender.
Serve with butter.

recipes.name: Microwave Mac & Cheese
recipes.description: In a time crunch? My macaroni and cheese is quick to whip up and calls for just a few ingredients, making this mug recipe a fan favorite.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: In a large microwavable mug or large bowl add in the macaroni and the water. You need a large mug as the water will boil up.
Microwave for roughly 3.5 minutes. You want the pasta to be fully cooked. (Timing is based on my 1200w microwave so your timing might vary)
Pour off the remaining cooking water.
Stir in the milk, cornstarch and shredded cheese and microwave for a final 60 seconds to create your sauce. Stir well, season with salt and pepper and enjoy.

recipes.name: Frozen Blueberry Bites
recipes.description: Healthy, delicious and easy to make, this triple-threat recipe is sure to become a go-to favorite.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: In a large bowl, carefully mix the blueberries, lemon juice and yogurt together. (Be gentle; you don’t want any berries to get squished.)
Scoop out the yogurt-coated blueberries one by one and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Freeze for about an hour, or overnight.

recipes.name: 5-Minute Silken Tofu with Green Onion
recipes.description: This easy vegan recipe using silken tofu is a quick-to-make appetizer. You'll love the silky texture.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: Place the silken tofu on a plate. If you find the silken tofu is weeping, drain it using a paper towel to soak up the water or tilt the plate over the sink to pour out the excess liquid.
Cut the silken tofu into cubes. You may need to be careful when halving the block of silken tofu height-wise. Don't cut your hands and avoid squishing the tofu.
Chop and sprinkle the green onions over the silken tofu.
Pour the shoyu over the silken tofu and green onions.

recipes.name: 5-Minute Vegetarian Burrito Bowl
recipes.description: An easy way to make a vegetarian burrito bowl without doing any actual cooking or even leaving your dorm room.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: In a microwave-safe bowl, combine rice, black beans, salsa, plain Greek yogurt, and shredded cheese. Microwave on high for 30-60 seconds, or until heated through.
Dice avocado and to the bowl
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Toaster Oven Roasted Broccoli
recipes.description: Toaster Oven Roasted Broccoli is the perfect quick and easy side dish. A squeeze of fresh lemon brightens up this easy roasted vegetable side dish.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: Adjust your toaster oven cooking rack to the lowest position and heat to 425°F on the “Bake” setting. Lightly oil a rimmed baking pan
Cut the broccoli florets from the stalks and slice large florets in half or quarter. Peel the stalks and slice into 1/4-inch rounds.
Add all of the broccoli, garlic, oil, salt, pepper to the pan. Toss well to combine and then spread in an even layer.
Roast broccoli until the florets are lightly browned and fork-tender, about 10 to 16 minutes depending on the size of your florets and personal preference.
Sprinkle lemon juice over pan and add more salt and pepper to taste and toss broccoli before serving.

recipes.name: Crispy Microwave Potato Chips
recipes.description: You won't believe how easy it is to make Crispy Microwave Potato Chips for delicious, crunchy chips containing all-natural ingredients.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: Rinse potatoes, scrubbing any dirt off skin. Peel if desired, but I like chips with the skins on.

Thinly slice your potatoes using a knife. The thinner, the better, so you want to slice thinly enough that you are almost shaving the potato; so thin they are transparent. Slices should be between 1/8 - 1/16 inch thick.
Immediately place slices in ice water. This helps to remove the starch and create crispy chips with those delicious air pockets.
Dry both sides well on a kitchen towel or paper towel. The dryer they are the better they will crisp.
Line a plate with a piece of parchment paper. Lay the potato slices out so they aren't touching. Brush with a little olive oil, then sprinkle with salt.

Microwave on high for roughly 1.30- 2.30 minutes on one side, and then roughly 1 - 2 minutes on the other side or until golden brown. Timing may vary based on your microwave. You will know when they are done as they will crisp and turn a toasted brown color.
Sprinkle the finished potato chips with salt and enjoy

recipes.name: Miso Glazed Salmon Recipe
recipes.description: Charred, sweet and savory with a tender interior, this is about as good as salmon gets.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: Whisk together miso, soy sauce, oil, and sugar. Rub mixture over every surface of salmon fillets. Transfer to a plastic zipper lock bag or sealable container. Proceed immediately to next step, or for best results, marinate for about 30 minutes or up to 2 days.

Preheat a broiler (toaster oven or regular oven) to high. Cover a small broiler pan with aluminum foil. Rub excess marinade off of salmon and place on broiler pan. Broil until top surface is well charred and salmon is barely warm in the center, about 5 minutes, using the foil to protect any areas that threaten to burn. Serve immediately.
Serve with rice or vegetables

recipes.name: PB & J Sandwich
recipes.description: A quick and simple lunch to get you through that 12 PM lecture.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: (Optional) Place slices of bread in toaster and set it to preferred level of toastiness.
Spread peanut butter onto one slice of bread.
Spread jelly onto other slice of bread.
Put pieces of bread together and enjoy.

recipes.name: Sloppy Joeʻs
recipes.description: Great recipe for game nights with your friends!
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Heat a large skillet and ook ground beef 3-4 minutes.
Add in chopped onion and green pepper then cook another 3-5 minutes.
Stir in ketchup, brown sugar, yellow mustard and garlic powder, then let simmer for 20-30 minutes.
Divide meat evenly among 6 buns and enjoy!

recipes.name: Tatertot Casserole
recipes.description: A quick and easy dinner with only 4 ingredients.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Heat a large skillet and cook ground beef for 7-10 minutes.
Trasnfer ground beef to baking dish and layer tater tots on top.
Sprinkle shredded cheese on top of tater tots.
Bake for 30-40 minutes.

recipes.name: Baked Garlic Parmesan Chicken
recipes.description: Amazing chicken to add on top of any pasta or salad for a great tasting meal.
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F, lightly grease a baking dish.
Blend olive oil and garlic into one bowl and mix bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, basil and pepper in another bowl.
Dip each chicken breast in the olive oil mixture then in the breadcrumb mixture making sure to cover the entire thing.
Bake for 30 min or until chicken is fully cooked.

recipes.name: Chicken Pot Pie
recipes.description: Easy to make chicken pot pie using pie crust!
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Dice chicken breast and combine with vegetables, cream of chicken soup and milk in a bowl.
Lay bottom pie crust in a pan and pour mixture in.
Cover with top pie crust, seal the edges and poke holes in the top.
Bake in the oven until the crust is golden brown (about 30 min).

recipes.name: Creamy Pesto Mac with spinach
recipes.description: A simple mac and cheese with pesto sauce.
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Thaw spinach and bring a pot of water to a boil.
Add macaroni noodles to pot and let boil 7-10 minutes then drain.
Heat small pot and butter and flour then stir until it forms a creamy sauce.
Whisk milk into butter and flour mixture, let simmer to thicken and remove from heat.
Whisk parmesan and pesto into sauce until smooth, season with salt and pepper to taste.
Combine noodles, spinach and sauce back into large pot and stir until everything is evenly coated.

recipes.name: Homemade Garlic Bread
recipes.description: Easy garlic bread that you can freeze and toast at anytime to enjoy.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Add butter, olive oil, minced garlic, garlic powder, salt and parsley to a bowl.
Mix all together until you get a smooth mixture.
Slice french loaf into 1-inch thick slices.
Spread mixture evenly onto all slices.
Arrange slices on baking sheet and put into freeze to allow butter to harden.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F and bake as many slices as you like for 5-7 minutes.

recipes.name: Apple Pie Overnight Oats
recipes.description: Easy, tasty, make-ahead breakfast to grab on the way out in the morning.
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Add 1/3 cup oats to 4 resealable containers along with 1/8 tsp cinnamon, pinch of ginger and pinch of cloves.
Add 2 tbsp chopped walnuts and 1 tbsp dried cranberries to each container.
Add 1/3 cup applesauce and 1/3 cup milk to each container.
Close containers and refrigerate overnight or up to 4 days. Stir before eating.

recipes.name: Sausage and Egg Breakfast Quesadilla
recipes.description: Easy filling breakfast that can be frozen to enjoy later.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Add sausage to a skillet and cook until fully browned.
Crack eggs into bowl and season with salt and pepper, whisk eggs.
Cook eggs in skillet until they are set but still moist, add in sausage and cheese.
Fold together until cheese is melted and ingredients are evenly mixed.
Divide evenly among tortillas, fold over and place back in skillet until tortillas are crispy and brown.

recipes.name: Cheesecake Crescent Rolls
recipes.description: Easy sweet breakfast treat to impress your friends.
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Unroll and spread out 1 can of cresecent dough in a baking dish.
Combine sofetened cream cheese, sugar and vanilla and spread or crescent dough.
Unroll other can of crescent dough and lay on top cream cheese.
Melt butter and spread over the top, sprinkle cinnamon and sugar over the top.
Bake for 20-30 min until bubbly and slightly brown.

recipes.name: Delicious Avocado Sandwich
recipes.description: This was always a lunchtime favorite with my gal pals. It's simple, delicious, and refreshing! The measurements for the ingredients are all approximate, as this sandwich is best when tailored to personal taste. Particularly scrumptious on potato, oat, or country white bread. Enjoy!
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Lay 1 slice bread on a plate. Place provolone cheese on bread and top with avocado and tomato slices, respectively. Drizzle balsamic vinegar over tomato and top with remaining slice of bread.

recipes.name: Arugula and Hummus Mini Pizzas
recipes.description: A nice quick and fresh snack that is healthy and delicious! This can also be made on pita bread instead of naan.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Spread hummus onto naan bread; top with arugula, date, and pumpkin seeds. Drizzle balsamic vinegar over pizza.

recipes.name: Creamy Parmesan Polenta
recipes.description: Grab a polenta package, one cup of chicken broth, and some Parmesan cheese and you're minutes away from a deliciously creamy polenta side dish. You can also serve it as an appetizer or use it as a base for a hearty stew.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Combine polenta and chicken broth in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until polenta has broken down and blended with the broth, about 5 minutes.
Remove from the heat; stir in Parmesan cheese, pepper, and paprika.

recipes.name: Tomato Basil Salmon
recipes.description: This quick salmon dish is perfect for a weeknight dinner. Serve with a side of sauteed spinach and a glass of pinot noir.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with a piece of aluminum foil, and spray with nonstick cooking spray. Place the salmon fillets onto the foil, sprinkle with basil, top with tomato slices, drizzle with olive oil, and sprinkle with the Parmesan cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven until the salmon is opaque in the center, and the Parmesan cheese is lightly browned on top, about 20 minutes.

recipes.name: Quick and Easy Mashed Sweet Potatoes
recipes.description: This is my favorite quick and easy recipe. For more flavor, add maple syrup.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes; drain.
Transfer potatoes to a large bowl; mash butter, garlic, basil, and thyme into the potatoes with a potato masher until smooth.

recipes.name: Mexi-Chicken Avocado Cups
recipes.description: A Mexican-style side dish made of chicken and avocado, no cooking required. It's a quick, healthy, and delicious recipe guaranteed to make you feel and look good.
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Stir chicken, cilantro, and chili powder together in a bowl.
Arrange avocado halves on serving dish and brush with lime juice. Spoon chicken mixture into avocado halves.

recipes.name: No-Egg Blueberry Mug Cake
recipes.description: The perfect dessert when you're home alone and have a craving for sometime homemade and fruity. It is also egg free so perfect for those with allergies.
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Combine flour, sugar, vanilla sugar, and baking powder in a large mug. Add milk and oil; mix batter well with a fork or a small whisk. Carefully fold in blueberries so they are completely covered with batter.
Microwave on high until cake has risen by 50%, 30 seconds to 2 minutes, depending on strength of your microwave. Allow to cool in the mug for a few minutes. Dust with confectioners' sugar.

recipes.name: Healthy Peanut Butter Mousse
recipes.description: I whipped this up after school one day when I wanted peanut butter and a healthy snack. There are many other toppings that can be used with this such as Nutella®, extra peanut butter, granola, fruit, oats, graham crackers, cookies, or cereal. The possibilities are endless!
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Microwave peanut butter in a microwave-safe bowl until liquid and smooth, about 20 seconds.
Stir Greek yogurt into the peanut butter with a spoon until smooth, scraping off any peanut butter stuck to the spoon. Stir in stevia and vanilla extract. Fold in chocolate chips.

recipes.name: Salted Chocolate-Peanut Butter Vegan Nice Cream
recipes.description: It's like your favorite peanut butter cup, but better because it includes a touch of salt. And, ya know, it's in nice cream (=ice cream) form, so...yum.
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Place cashews in a bowl and cover with water. Soak for 1 to 3 hours. Drain.

Combine soaked cashews, banana, ice cubes, tofu, cacao powder, dates, peanut butter, vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon soy milk, and salt in a blender. Process until smooth. Add an additional teaspoon of soy milk only if needed, in order to keep the mixture as thick as possible.
Pour into a bowl and sprinkle with crushed peanuts.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: This is a delicious, healthy, hearty breakfast recipe. If you are not vegan, you can add fried eggs to your toast for a delicious vegetarian meal.
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Toast bread in a toaster or toaster oven.
Scoop avocado into a bowl. Add parsley, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, onion powder, and garlic powder; mash together using a potato masher. Spread avocado mixture into each piece of toast.

recipes.name: Fried Rice
recipes.description: A great meal to combine all of the leftover ingredients from the fridge and to use any leftover rice.
recipes.author: Admin

instructions.step: Crack and whisk the two eggs together.
Heat a wok or large frying pan over medium heat. Drizzle in 2 tablespoons of oil and scramble the eggs for 30 seconds or until cooked to your preference. Set the eggs aside on a plate.
Dice carrots and onions

Drizzle in 2 tablespoons of oil again to the wok. Fry the toughest vegetable (for this recipe it is the carrots) for a couple of minutes. Then keep frying the next tender vegetable (onions) and fry for another couple of minutes. Lastly, add in the most tender vegetable and cook for a minute. Set aside the cooked vegetables.
Fry the meat in the wok for a few minutes or until the meat is cooked.

Drizzle in 2 tablespoons of oil again to the wok. Add in the leftover rice and fry it until all of the rice has been coated in the oil. Add in the oyster sauce, shoyu, and salt. Stir fry until well combined.
Add everything back to the wok. Eggs, vegetables, and meat. Stir fry everything until has mixed well. Serve hot as a hearty meal or side dish. Enjoy!

recipes.name: Spam Musubi
recipes.description: Spam Musubi is a famous Hawaii snack made from Spam, rice, and nori. It's portable, affordable, and tasty! It's the most popular way to eat Spam in Hawaii.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Wash uncooked rice, drain and rinse.
Bring 2 cups water to a boil in a medium saucepan. Add rice and stir. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes.
Slice luncheon meat lengthwise into 10 slices, or to desired thickness.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook slices until lightly browned, about 2 minutes per side.

Cut nori sheets in half and lay on a flat work surface. Place a rice press in the center of a sheet, and press rice tightly inside. Top with a slice of luncheon meat, and remove press. Wrap nori around rice, sealing edges with a small amount of water. (Rice may also be formed by hand in the shape of the meat slices and about 1-inch thick.)

recipes.name: Cucumber Onion Salad
recipes.description: This is a delicious, healthy, hearty breakfast recipe. If you are not vegan, you can add fried eggs to your toast for a delicious vegetarian meal.
recipes.author: john

instructions.step: Slice each cucumber in ¼-inch slices and add to a large bowl.
Slice onions into half moons
Add in the sliced red onion and toss to combine
In a mason jar or small bowl, whisk together the apple cider vinegar, water, sugar, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing mixture over the cucumber and onion and toss to fully coat/combine.

recipes.name: Parmesan Potato Wedges
recipes.description: When you are craving fries but want a healthy alternative
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 400°.
Mix parmesan, salt, garlic powder, oregano and chilli powder together.
Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges; place in a parchment-lined 15x10x1-in. pan. Spritz with cooking spray; sprinkle with cheese mixture. Bake until tender, about 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio E Olio
recipes.description: An easy pasta dinner that you can make very quickly!
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add 2 tablespoons of salt and the pasta and cook according to the directions on the package. Set aside 1 1/2 cups of the pasta cooking water before you drain the pasta.

Meanwhile, heat the olive oil over medium heat in a pot large enough to hold the pasta, such as a 12-inch saute pan or a large, shallow pot. Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently, until it just begins to turn golden on the edges-don't overcook it! Carefully add the reserved pasta-cooking water to the garlic and oil and bring to a boil. Lower the heat, add 1 teaspoon of salt, and simmer for about 5 minutes, until the liquid is reduced by about a third.
Add the drained pasta to the garlic sauce and toss. Off the heat, add the parsley and Parmesan and toss well. Allow the pasta to rest off the heat for 5 minutes

recipes.name: Microwave Corn on the Cob
recipes.description: Microwave corn on the cob quickly and easily, with only a microwave!
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Remove the husk and silk from corn.
Wrap a moist paper towel around the corn and place it on a microwave-safe plate.
Microwave until the kernels are tender, but still crisp (three to five minutes).

recipes.name: Tasty 2-Step Chicken Bake
recipes.description: Super easy with only 2 ingredients!
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Heat the oven to 400°F.   While the oven is heating, season the chicken with salt and pepper.  Place the chicken into an 8x8x2-inch baking dish.  Spread the soup over the chicken.  Cover the baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes or until the chicken is done.

recipes.name: Baked Banana Chips
recipes.description: Simple and easy crispy banana chips
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Slice bananas into 1/10 inch pieces
Preheat the oven to 225 degrees F (110 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Spread banana slices out onto the prepared baking sheet, making sure slices are not touching. Brush with lemon juice.
Bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes. Check bananas, lifting slices up to separate from the paper once or twice. Continue baking until bananas are dried out, 30 to 90 minutes more.
Let bananas cool until crispy, at least 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Quick-n'-Easy Chicken Cheesesteak
recipes.description: A chicken cheesesteak sandwich made with just 3 ingredients and ready in less than 5 minutes. Add sautéed bell peppers and onions if desired.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Warm chicken in a nonstick skillet over medium heat, until heated through, about 3 minutes
Scrape chicken into the center of the pan to form a shape similar to the bun. Cut cheddar cheese slice in half and place over chicken; cook until cheddar is melted, 1 to 2 minutes.
Place chicken and cheese mixture onto the one half of hamburger bun. Top it with the other half

recipes.name: Tuna Mayo Onigiri
recipes.description: Sushi on a budget, this filling dish will be sure to fix your sushi cravings!
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Wash and cook the rice.
While the rice cooks, open the can of tuna and drain out any excess liquid. Add the tuna to a bowl along with the mayonnaise and soy sauce. Mix well to form a uniform paste.
Prepare a bowl of water and a small bowl of salt.
When the rice is cooked, stir it to fluff and then transfer it to a bowl to cool slightly and cover it with a damp towel to keep it from drying out.
When the rice is cool enough to handle but still on the hot side, wet your hands in the water bowl. Dab your index finger in the bowl of salt and rub the salt around your hands.
Working quickly, scoop ⅙ of the rice into your non-dominant hand and make a little well in the center of the rice.
Add about 2 teaspoons of tuna mayo filling into the well and cover the tuna with the surrounding rice.
Cup the hand holding the rice like a taco and then use 2-3 fingers of your opposite hand to shape the rice into a triangle.
Toss the rice ball onto another side and then repeat the cupping and shaping step. Repeat until the onigiri is the desired shape.

recipes.name: Fried Bacon-Wrapped Enoki Mushrooms
recipes.description: This is one of the popular appetizers! Enoki mushrooms have a mild, savory taste and crunchy texture. These mushrooms look like a cluster of small flower buds and reputed to have many healthful properties.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Wash enoki mushrooms under cold running water. Cut off the root parts, then separate mushrooms into 12 bunches.
In a medium nonstick skillet, heat the butter over medium heat. Add enoki wraps and cook, turning once, until bacon turns golden brown, for about 4 minutes.
Remove cooked enoki wraps from the skillet. Drain on the paper towels. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Roasted Lemony Fish Fillets
recipes.description: Air fryer roasted lemony fish fillets. It might seem like a simple kitchen hack, but the air fryer is the best way to roast fish. It’s safer than using a deep fryer, and it creates less grease.
recipes.author: Chris

ingredients.name: kosher salt freshly ground black pepper

instructions.step: Spray the top of the fish ( I used cod fillets) with olive oil and sprinkle with lemon juice. Season with salt and black pepper. Spread the Dijon mustard on top of the fillets.
Preheat your air fryer to 400 F (200 C) for 5 minutes.
Working in batches, place the fillets in the air fryer basket in a single layer. Fry at 375 F (190 C) for 7-8 minutes. Repeat with the remaining fillets. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Slow Cooker Caramel Flan
recipes.description: Flan is a traditional Spanish and Latin American dessert recipe that is often prepared with eggs, sugar, and milk. The slow cooker is an excellent way to prepare this dessert because it allows the custard to cook slowly without the risk of burning.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: Melt 1/3 cup sugar in a small nonstick skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until it turns golden. Quickly pour the syrup into the bottom of a 1-quart (1 L) souffle dish. Tilt the bottom to spread the caramel. Set it aside and allow it to cool.

In the same skillet, heat the milk and the remaining 1/3 cup of sugar until steaming and beginning to bubble at the edges. Whisk the milk mixture into eggs and vanilla. Pour into the souffle dish over caramel.
Place the souffle dish on a rack in a 6-quart (6 L0 slow cooker. Add 1-inch (2.5 cm) of hot water to the slow cooker.
Cover the pot and cook on a low-heat setting for 1½-2 hours, or until the custard is set and a sharp knife inserted halfway in the center comes out clean.

Turn off the cooker and open the lid. Remove the souffle dish and transfer it to a wire rack. Cool, then refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight. To unmold, just loosen the edge of the custard with a sharp knife. Place a rimmed serving dish over the souffle dish and invert. Enjoy!

recipes.name: Basic Mashed Potatoes
recipes.description: Made with Idaho potatoes, milk, butter, and optional garlic, this go-to recipe for simple, homemade mashed potatoes is a classic holiday dish.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and garlic, lower heat to medium, and simmer until potatoes are tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
When the potatoes are almost finished, heat milk and butter in a small saucepan over low heat until butter is melted.
Drain potatoes and return to the pot.
Slowly add warm milk mixture, blending it in with a potato masher or electric mixer until potatoes are smooth and creamy. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Oyakodon
recipes.description: Oyakodon is a delicious traditional Japanese meal consisting of chicken sautéed and then cooked in a Japanese broth, and then finished with egg and served over rice. It's really easy, filling, and delicious.
recipes.author: Chris

ingredients.name: skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into small pieces
onion, cut in half and sliced
dashi stock, made with dashi powder

instructions.step: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken and cook until beginning to brown, about 5 minutes. Add onion; cook and stir until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.    Pour in stock, then whisk in soy sauce, mirin, and brown sugar; stir until sugar dissolves. Bring to a boil, then lower heat and simmer until slightly reduced, about 10 minutes.
Whisk eggs in a bowl until well-beaten, then pour into the hot stock mixture. Cover the skillet, reduce the heat, and steam until egg is cooked, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat.
Divide rice among 4 deep soup bowls and top with equal amounts of the soup mixture.

recipes.name: Easy Sesame Chicken
recipes.description: This sweet and savory dish is simple to make and budget-friendly. Add broccoli and serve over rice or noodles for a complete meal.
recipes.author: John

ingredients.name: skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-sized pieces

instructions.step: Whisk cornstarch, salt, and black pepper together in a large bowl; add chicken and toss to coat.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Fry chicken in batches, turning occasionally, until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
Whisk together honey, soy sauce, rice vinegar, chile-garlic sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil, and 1 tablespoon sesame seeds in a small bowl.

Pour sauce over chicken in the skillet; toss to coat chicken. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer until sauce thickens and chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 2 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), about 2 minutes.
Sprinkle with remaining 1 tablespoon sesame seeds and chopped green onions.

recipes.name: Special Fried Rice
recipes.description: This special fried rice is a variation of the typical restaurant-style fried rice and is sure to be a hit! Any cooked meat can be added, but it tastes great with shrimp, bacon, Spam, ham, Chinese sausage, or pork.
recipes.author: Chris

ingredients.name: frozen peas and carrots, thawed and patted dry with paper towel

instructions.step: Heat 2 teaspoons canola oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat until smoking.

Beat eggs and water together in a bowl until smooth. Pour beaten egg mixture into the skillet, let it cook in the oil briefly to begin to firm, and then scramble lightly with a wooden spoon until the eggs are cooked and shiny, 2 to 3 minutes. Remove cooked eggs to a plate.

Pour 1 teaspoon sesame oil into the hot pan. Add enough canola oil to cover the cooking surface of the pan and heat to smoking. Sauté onion and garlic in oil until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes; add peas and carrots and cook until hot, 1 to 2 minutes more. Return cooked eggs to the pan.

Gradually add rice to the skillet, tossing chunks to break into individual grains and mixing with vegetables; cook and stir until the rice starts to turn a light brown color and is completely hot, 2 to 3 minutes.

Stir Sriracha sauce, soy sauce, fish sauce, sugar, salt, white pepper, and monosodium glutamate into the rice mixture; continue to cook and stir until the grains of rice are no longer sticking together, 2 to 3 minutes more. Remove pan from heat. Sprinkle green onion and cilantro over rice; toss to mix.

Peel outside skin of cucumber with vegetable shredder to create a ragged design on the outside. Slice cucumber diagonally and arrange in a circle around a serving platter. Serve rice in the middle of the platter; top with additional green onion and white pepper.

recipes.name: Roasted Garlic Lemon Broccoli
recipes.description: Florets are roasted after being tossed in olive oil and sprinkled with sea salt, freshly ground black pepper, and minced garlic. A squeeze of lemon juice before serving seals the deal.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Toss broccoli florets with extra virgin olive oil, sea salt, pepper, and garlic in a large bowl. Spread the broccoli out in an even layer on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until florets are tender enough to pierce the stems with a fork, 15 to 20 minutes. Remove and transfer to a serving platter.
Squeeze lemon juice liberally over broccoli before serving for a refreshing, tangy finish.

recipes.name: Chef John's New Orleans-Style Barbequed Shrimp
recipes.description: This indigenous American shellfish dish, cooked on the stovetop, has plenty of big flavors from garlic, rosemary, and freshly cracked black pepper. Serve over hot cooked rice. Use the largest shrimp you can get.
recipes.author: Chris

instructions.step: Peel shrimp and place into a mixing bowl; set shrimp shells aside in a saucepan.

Drizzle vegetable oil over shrimp and season with black pepper, smoked paprika, cayenne pepper, and seafood seasoning. Mix shrimp to coat with spices and cover bowl with plastic wrap; refrigerate shrimp to absorb flavors, at least 1 hour.

Place reserved shrimp shells in saucepan over medium-high heat with 1 tablespoon butter; cook and stir until shells are pink and fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes. Pour in chicken stock, bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low; simmer until shrimp shells have given off their flavor, 20 to 30 minutes.
Strain shrimp stock through a fine mesh strainer into a bowl and add lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and hot sauce. Stir to combine.
Place a large skillet over high heat until pan is very hot; sear shrimp in the very hot, dry pan until shrimp are browned, about 1 minute per side.
Stir 3 tablespoons cold butter, garlic, and minced rosemary into shrimp; cook and stir until shrimp are opaque in the middle and garlic is fragrant, 1 minute. Pour in shrimp stock.

Transfer shrimp from skillet to a bowl, using a slotted spoon; reserve sauce in skillet. Bring sauce to a boil and cook until reduced slightly, about 5 minutes. Adjust seasoning to taste. Return shrimp to pan, reduce heat to low, and warm through, about 1 minute. Serve shrimp drizzled with pan sauce; garnish with a rosemary sprig.

recipes.name: Sarah's Ambrosia Fruit Salad
recipes.description: It's a great refreshing fruit salad for every occasion, especially summer months and hot days.
recipes.author: John

instructions.step: Mix pineapple, oranges, sour cream, marshmallows, and coconut together in a bowl. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until flavors blend, 2 hours to overnight.
